Question 1:

Question 2:

```{r}
total_grades <- grades |> summarise(total=n()) |> pull(total)
paste("The dataset contains", total_grades, "grades")
```

Question 3:

```{r}
num_students <- grades |> distinct(id) |> summarise(n = n()) |> pull(n)
paste("The dataset contains", num_students , "students")
```
